author: Scott McDonald
title: Basketball World Mourns Death of Karl-Anthony Towns' Mother, Who Passed Away From Coronavirus Complications
description: Jacqueline Towns had battled coronavirus for more than a month before she died Monday from complications of the virus. The basketball world mourned on social media.
content:
The Minnesota Timberwolves of the NBA announced Monday afternoon that Jacqueline Towns, the mother of star player Karl-Anthony Towns, passed away of complications from COVID-19, also known as coronavirus.
She was simply known as "Jackie" to the many friends … [+3516 chars]
